Server.Name: Just Die Already Edition
Server.Description:
An overhaul vanilla mod for veteran players who find pure vanilla too easy and are seeking a challenge with the vanilla feel. This overhaul mod adds survival that is lacking in the game.
**This version is even tougher than the Survivalist Version**
Recommended settings: Warrior, Run during the day, No loot respawn, 24 blood moon count, Airdrops weekly.
- More wild zombie spawns. - Slower progression to extend the live of a world to 100+ days. - Farming is nerfed so the struggle for food extends to mid game. - Less ammo, food and quantity in loot, less resources when mining and harvesting ores/blocks. - Economy rebalanced so you won't be swimming in dukes as easily and have to make thoughtful decisions when buying. - A Single Player version of the Charismatic Nature perk. (Survival Instinct) - Dying has a harsher consequence, retaining debuffs and hunger, etc. - And much more! ***Added the Spencer Mansion (Resident Evil) a Tier 6 quest*** ***You MUST use Nitrogen World Generator and download the supporting file (link below) for it to spawn in your world***
Full list of changes can be found at the bottom of the List of Changes document. For the original changes, and the file for Nitrogen, go here: https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22254-7-years-to-die-survivor-desolate-interloper-exile-survivor-v116-a193/
